TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit DeferrableContentConverter extends System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter

Docs.summary: Converts a stream to a <see cref="T:System.Windows.DeferrableContent"> instance.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.DeferrableContentConverter"> class.

MemberSignature.Value: public override bool CanConvertFrom (System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext context, Type sourceType);
.method public hidebysig virtual instance bool CanConvertFrom(class System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext context, class System.Type sourceType) cil managed

Docs.param: An <xref:System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext> that provides a format context.
A <see cref="T:System.Type"> that represents the type you want to convert from.
Docs.summary: Returns whether this converter can convert the specified object to a <see cref="T:System.Windows.DeferrableContent"> object.
Docs.returns: `true` if this converter can perform the conversion; otherwise, `false`.

remarks.format: ## Remarks This implementation returns `true` only for a that is assignable to <xref:System.IO.Stream>. All other types return `false`.

MemberSignature.Value: public override object ConvertFrom (System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext context, System.Globalization.CultureInfo culture, object value);
.method public hidebysig virtual instance object ConvertFrom(class System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext context, class System.Globalization.CultureInfo culture, object value) cil managed

Docs.param: An <xref:System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext> that provides a format context.
The <see cref="T:System.Globalization.CultureInfo"> to use as the current culture.
Docs.summary: Converts the specified stream to a new <see cref="T:System.Windows.DeferrableContent"> object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The value for must provide services for <xref:System.Xaml.IXamlSchemaContextProvider>, <xref:System.Xaml.IRootObjectProvider>, <xref:System.Xaml.IXamlObjectWriterFactory>, and <xref:System.Windows.Markup.IProvideValueTarget>. The schema context when <xref:System.Xaml.IXamlSchemaContextProvider> is queried must be an internally implemented XAML schema context that is particular for BAML usages. This prevents most user code scenarios from using <xref:System.Windows.DeferrableContentConverter>.
